General.Name: Career Technology MFG Co Ltd
General.Description: Career Technology (Mfg.) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flexible printed circuits in Taiwan, Mainland China, the United States, and internationally. It offers single-sided, double-sided, double access, and multilayer flexible circuits; air gap structures; and rigid-flex boards, as well as membrane switches, and coaxial cable connectors and machinery. The company provides integrated IC packaging and flexible circuit boards assembling services. Its products are used in various applications, such as smart phones, tablet PCs, GPS, automotive electronics, cameras, ultrabooks, wearable devices, and virtual reality. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 248, Bo-ai Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 238
